title: EX-PFIZER CEO MIKE YEADON ON THE DANGERS OF THE MRNA VACCINES AND VACCINE PASSPORTS (APRIL 2021) | The Irish Sentinel
cleaned_text: Last American Vagabond interviews pro-vaccine, pro-pharmaceuticals Mike Yeadon (ex Pfizer CEO) on the the dangers of the mRNA vaccine and why he believes the vaccine is being used as a proxy to introduce vaccine passports.
